cleaned_text: Positive Energy Crystal Travel Set: Aquamarine, Fluorite, Rose Quartz, Tigers Eye - in Charm Bag £9.00 [](https://assets.bigcartel.com/product_images/305408403/posenergy.jpg?auto=format&fit=max&w=1500) A selection of polished Crystals to carry with you through your day - in your bag, pocket, car or to display in your living space or work area This set of 4 Crystals comprises of: Aquamarine: Associated with Courage and Calming Anxiety. Pale Green Tones. Fluorite: Associated with Clarity, Calming Stress, Confidence and Calming Negativity. Green to Purple Tones. Rose Quartz: Associated with Love, Friendship, Peace and Harmony. Pale Pink Tones. Tigers Eye: Associated with Luck, Positivity, Energy and Strength. Coffee tones with metallic shimmers. - This Set is sent with Crystal Info in a fabric gift pouch with a tiny silver tone heart charm *Midnight Deer orders are sent in recyclable / reusable and / or recycled packaging wherever possible
